title: robelneo
author: robelneo
created_time: May 26, 2023, 04:19:28 AMLast edit: May 28, 2023, 01:53:57 PM by robelneo
content: Though Garcia and Lara cannot be considered popular boxers in the boxing community this fight promises a lot of action, both fighters are hungry for recognition and this is the fight that could give that recognition and they have the same style of aggressive and moving forward style.QuoteLara, 40, was elevated as champion after Gennadiy Golovkin relinquished his title. A former 154-pound champion, Lara's impressive résumé includes a controversial decision loss to Paul Williams, a split decision defeat to Canelo Alvarez and a victory over Austin Trout.Garcia (37-3, 21 KOs) is a former unified 140-pound champion and 147-pound titleholder. He rose to prominence with an upset fourth-round TKO victory over Amir Khan in 2012 and followed up with an impressive victory over Lucas Matthysse the following year.They say style makes a fight so we are going to expect a lot of action and less running because both fighters always come to fight so who you got in this fighthttps://www.espn.com/boxing/story/_/id/37443325/erislandy-lara-defend-middleweight-title-vs-danny-garcia-august-5IMAGES FROM box.live

comments.author: FinneysTrueVision
comments.body: Lara used to be known as a boring fighter but he has slowed with age and his fights have been more interesting to watch in recent years. I don't know who either of these fighters have beaten to be fighting for a world title at middleweight but I guess that is the privilege of being an Al Haymon fighter. I favor Garcia slightly due to being not as old and less washed up but I expect it to be a competitive match.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on May 26, 2023, 04:19:28 AMThough Garcia and Lara cannot be considered popular boxers in the boxing community this fight promises a lot of action, both fighters are hungry for recognition and this is the fight that could give that recognition and they have the same style of aggressive and moving forward style.They say style makes a fight so we are going to expect a lot of action and less running because both fighters always come to fight so who you got in this fightThe battle is going to be a tough one because both are awesome fighters and they both have mastered their own style of fighting, but still I think the Garcia might be the winner of the match. The guy is too good at fights and has no fear of any kind of combat and that's why I think the odds are in the favor of him. But, still the competition is going to be a tough one and the winner will be praised for the victory.I know that the odds are in favor of Garcia this time but man the Lara is also a monster in the game and when he fights then he forgets everything about past and performs to his best against the opponent. The fighter is little bit aged and that's a con for him, but still old is gold and who knows if he has a better strategy to own the Garcia. The fight will be really entertaining and the audience will love the match.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: What makes this fight good to watch is they are just about even their record even their last 5 fights are also even and they have the same style, Lara has beaten 4 of his last 5 opponents, Garcia has beaten 3 of his last 5 opponents, and the knockout ratio is almost the same, I have Garcia here winning by close decision his age will carry him in the latter rounds and he proved himself to be a good finisher he had lasted and gave Spence a good fight and this experience will carry him.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Lara is one of the fighters that have given Canelo its toughest fights and he could have beaten Canelo if only the judges were not biased, Lara obviously won the fight, but this was 9 years ago checking Lara's last five fights he still has that move and power, but against Garcia who we now is a very aggressive fighter, Lara will be challenged I hope he is still good at his age to stand toe to toe against Garcia who can take the fight even in the final rounds like a fresh boxer.I have Garcia winning by a small margin, but there's a possibility of knockout because both fighters will go toe to toe and all out because this is a championship fight.
